description: This file is a JavaScript module that provides a frontend API client for the Quote Extraction Platform. It includes functions for health checks, authentication, asset management, transcript handling, quote operations, and export jobs, with support for mock data fallback.

methods.name: handleResponse
methods.description: Handles fetch responses, parsing JSON or text, and throws errors for non-OK responses.

methods.name: buildUrl
methods.description: Constructs a URL with optional query parameters based on the base URL and provided path.

methods.name: tryWithMock
methods.description: Attempts to execute an API call, falling back to mock data if the backend is unavailable or in mock mode.
